_exec_summary.SummaryText:
6800 Santa Fe LLC is committed to safety for employees, the public, and the environmental and strives to meet all appropriate federal, state, and local environmental and safety regulations. 6800 Santa Fe LLC is located at 6800 Santa Fe Drive, Hodgkins, Illinois. The facility is a warehouse for produce and meat products as well as some consumer products. The produce and meat products are kept refrigerated. Anhydrous ammonia has been used as a refrigerant. The refrigeration system contains ammonia in various states including liquid, vapor, and gas in various vessels, compressors, condensers, pipes,and evaporators.

                                                                      
 6800 Santa Fe LLC complies with the Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA) Process Safety Management of Hazardous Chemicals (the PSM standard) to reduce the possibility of accidental release of highly hazardous chemicals. The PSM standard (29 CFR 1910.119) is designated to protect employees by preventing or minimizing the consequences of catastrophic releases of toxic, reactive, flammable or explosive chemicals. The PSM standard addresses the following 12 elements of the prevention program:                                                                                                                                       

> Employee Participation
>Process Safety Information
>Process Hazard Analysis
>Operating Procedures
>Training
>Mechanical Integrity
>Management of Change
>Pre-Start up Safety Review
>Compliance Audit
>Incident Investigation
>Employee Participation
>Hot Work Permit
>Contractor Safety

6800 Santa Fe LLC has an emergency action plan.
